column4: pls... i can't check my emails (gmail and hotmail) through ubuntu-feisty... i have enabled cookies and javascript in browser...
what happens when you visit gmail?
yes, that's kind of strange.  Have you tried a different browser?  Does it happen on windows if you have it?
i've installed konqueror... and i could check just once gmail
after that it failed just like firefox?
hmm it's really strange that it worked once though.  What if you clear the cache and try again?
even, cause other reasons i've had to reinstall all system and i get the same problem
how do you connect to the internet?
well just to troubleshoot, I would see if it happens when you skip the router and connect directly
i don't think router is the problem, 'cause when i had windows i didn't have this problem
